translations: 处罚，惩罚（做错事或犯法的人）；惩处（犯罪行为）；<非正式>（尤指体育运动中）利用（对手的失误）；粗暴地对待；使遭受严重打击；自责；<非正式> 贪婪地吃喝；施加惩罚

sentences.sentence: My parents used to punish me by not letting me watch TV.
sentences.translation: 过去我父母常以不让我看电视来惩罚我。

sentences.sentence: I don't believe that George ever had to punish the children.
sentences.translation: 我不相信乔治曾不得不惩罚这些孩子。

sentences.sentence: Current employment laws will be changed to reward effort and punish laziness.
sentences.translation: 现行的雇佣法将被修改以便奖勤罚懒。
